moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury
    Personal injuries can impact a family for months and years to come. Serious head, neck and back injuries can result from car accidents, motorcycle accidents or from seemingly minor slip and falls.
  • Criminal Defense
    The Hudson Valley criminal defense attorneys of Ostrer & Associates, P.C. provide vigorous and effective representation for defendants charged with any type of crime.

description:
Ostrer & Associates, P.C.: Experienced Criminal Defense And Personal Injury Representation Serving The Hudson Valley

At Ostrer & Associates, P.C., we are a team of attorneys with years of trial experience in both criminal defense and personal injury matters. Known throughout the Hudson Valley for our commitment to protecting the rights and interests of our clients, we have achieved numerous awards and settlements on behalf of accident victims...
